amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to reduce the nuclear forces of the United States in contravention of the Arms Control and Disarmament Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to reduce the nuclear forces of the United States in contravention of the Arms Control and Disarmament Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Turner.
